process.header_text: The BIOmass Tool for Alos (BIOTA) was developed by LTS International and the University of Edinburgh to calculate above-ground biomass from L-band satallite data in dry forests and savanhas, as well as biomass change and forest degradation.

req.description: Note: The following are required parameters, to get coordinates, click a point over the map.

outputs.ready: {} tile computed and ready to display

error.at_least_year: Please select at least one year.
error.at_least_process: Check at least one process to compute
error.before_write: Before to write, you have to calculate {}
error.before_display: Before to display, you have to calculate {}
error.assert_latitude: Latitude must be between -90 and 90 degrees.
error.assert_longitude: Longitude must be between -180 and 180 degrees.
error.assert_downsampling: Downsampling factor must be an integer greater than 1.
error.assert_lee_filter: Option lee_filter must be set to 'True' or 'False'.
error.assert_window_size: Option window_size must be an integer.
error.assert_widown_size_odd: Option window_size must be an odd integer.
error.assert_sm: Soil moisture interpolation type must be one of 'nearest', 'average' or 'cubic'.
error.both_years: To calculate change, both years has to be filled

alert.done_unzip: All the images were succesfully unzipped.

tooltip.coordinates: To get coordinates, click over an area in the map
